Hey, I was wondering if we could get an in-forum notification of a full inbox when someone tries to send us a message? I am frustrated by the fact that I receive an email, but I never look in my set email so I never see that notification! I think we need an in-forum notification system when someone tries to send us a message while our inbox is full!
